row1.name: Mike Johnson
row1.text: Our website went from getting 2-3 leads per month to 15-20 leads per month. The booking system alone has saved us 10 hours per week. Best investment we've made.

row1.name: Sarah Martinez
row1.text: Working with OAB was seamless despite being remote. Our leads tripled in 2 months, and the team was always responsive during USA business hours. Highly recommend!

row1.name: David Chen
row1.text: The mobile-first design means we're getting leads even when customers are on the go. Our conversion rate increased by 250% in the first quarter.

row1.name: Jennifer Williams
row1.text: The online booking system integrated perfectly with our schedule. We're now booking 40% more sessions, and I love how easy it is to manage everything.

row2.name: Robert Taylor
row2.text: The local SEO work they did got us ranking on page 1 for 'electrician near me' in just 3 months. We're booked solid now.

row2.name: Lisa Anderson
row2.text: Professional, fast, and results-driven. Our new website looks amazing and brings in consistent leads. The team understood exactly what we needed.

row2.name: Michael Brown
row2.text: Before OAB, we had a basic site that did nothing. Now we're getting 5-8 qualified leads per week. The ROI has been incredible.

row2.name: Amanda Davis
row2.text: The conversion optimization they did increased our contact form submissions by 4x. The website pays for itself every month with new clients.
